nodes.text: The Creaking Gate is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force adventure The Air Up Thaere. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on October 10 2002 and took the form of broadcast by Yara Grugara on the growing Thaereian military presence in the Cularin system and the Cularin Militia and Thaereian military's conflicting statements.
